nickname: /nick nickname: define the nickname of the user on the server
list: /list [string]: list the available channels from the server. If string is specified, only displays those whose name contains the string
create: /create channel: create a channel with the specified name
delete: /delete channel: delete the channel with the specified name.
users: /users: list the users currently in the channel
msg: /msg nickname message: send a private the message to the specified nickname.
message: message: send message the all the users on the channel
